cause.description:
This cause is to help the needy, as myself, to buy a much needed car. Please donate generously to my organization and I will repay you back one day. Remember that if we all work together, we can accomplish this goal. There is no 'I' im TEAM.
1. People need cars to live
2. Help the car-less
3. Help me
cause.name: Chris Needs Your Dough
